decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 4 (CTMP/CEMP (Details)) of planning permission 23/00273/FUL. Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
